channel.title: Sbm on Davide Vega D'Aurelio
channel.description: Recent content in Sbm on Davide Vega D'Aurelio

item.title: Stochastic blockmodeling methods for bipartite graphs
item.description: Stochastic block models (SBM) are generative models for network structures such as communities, sets of nodes characterized by being more densely connected with one another than with the rest of the network. One of the main advantages of generative models, such as SBM, is that they open the door to inference: if we are given a network G, we can use techniques from statistical inference to estimate the values of Î¸ that best explain or reproduce the observed pattern of connectivity.
